definition[0]: the skill of keeping three or more objects moving through the air by throwing and catching them
definition[1]: the practice of changing things or arranging them in a way that makes it possible for you to do something
example[1]: It took a lot of juggling and rearrangement of figures before the loan was approved.
definition[2]: when someone who has a good job in a profession they have trained for is also secretly involved in an illegal activity
